mapper.select: SELECT pro_ist_no, pro_ist_dt, (SELECT pro_nm FROM edcts WHERE pro_cd = e.pro_cd) AS "pro_nm", pro_ist_cnt, (SELECT pro_lot_no FROM pro_stc WHERE pro_ist_no = e.pro_ist_no AND pro_cd = e.pro_cd) AS "pro_lot_no" FROM edcts_ist e WHERE TO_CHAR(pro_ist_dt,'yyyyMMdd') = TO_CHAR( sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') ORDER BY pro_ist_no DESC
SELECT SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyyMMdd'),3) || (SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(PRO_IST_NO,-1,2)+1),1),4,'0') FROM edcts_ist WHERE TO_CHAR(pro_ist_dt,'yyyyMMdd')=TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyyMMdd') ) FROM dual
